title: Summer chicken and shrimp pasta for two Makes 2 servings This is a quick and easy pasta dish perfect for a weeknight’s supper.
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Set aside.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large fry pan over medium heat.
Add the chicken and cook for 5 minutes until fully cooked.
Add the red onion, garlic, and tomato and sauté for 5 minutes.
Add the shrimp and spinach and cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove from the heat and toss in the basil, pepper and cheese. Serve immediately over the pasta.
ingredients: 3 cups (750 mL) dry whole wheat pasta
1 chicken breast (about ½ lb / 250 g) diced
¼ cup (60 mL) diced red onion
1 cup (250 mL) cherry tomatoes, cut in half
1 cup (250 mL) fresh baby spinach, washed
1 tbsp (15 mL) finely chopped fresh basil or ½ tsp (2 mL) dried
